nodes.text: Blue milk custard was a comfort food made using the blue milk produced by bantha species native to the planet Tatooine. It was served as a dessert at Old Jho's Pit Stop, a cantina on the planet Lothal run by the Ithorian Jho. The custard was one of the human Jedi Knight Kanan Jarrus's top five favorite desserts served in the establishment.
Blue milk custard was first mentioned in Star Wars: Absolutely Everything You Need to Know, a reference book released in 2015.
